globalConfigMenu.name: Paper Doll Global Settings
globalConfigMenu.hint: Customize empty images and number of slots for each type.
globalConfigMenu.label: Configure Paper Doll

hideActorHeaderText.name: Hide Actor Header Button Text
hideActorHeaderText.hint: Hide the text in the actor header button.

paperDollPosition.name: Paper Doll Position
paperDollPosition.hint: Position of the paper doll when opened. Note that if the space is not sufficient on the left or right, the paper doll will be placed in the middle.
paperDollPosition.label: Position

autoOpen.name: Auto Open
autoOpen.hint: Automatically open the paper doll when an actor sheet is opened.

allowNonOwned.name: Allow Non Owned Items
allowNonOwned.hint: Allow non owned items (eg, items from the sidebar or compendium) to be added to the paper doll. This setting is meant for custom systems which do not have an inventory system and should generally be left off.

playerOwnedOnly.name: Player Owned Only
playerOwnedOnly.hint: Only enable Paper Doll for player owned actors.

paper-doll.title: Paper Doll
paper-doll.disallowed: This item is not allowed to be equipped to this slot.

playerOwnedOnly.label: Player Owned Only
playerOwnedOnly.hint: Only enable Paper Doll for player owned actors.

filter.label: Custom Filter
filter.hint: A script used to create a window with items that can be equipped to this slot. 'item' refers to the item being checked. Example: return item.type === 'weapon';

simpleFilter.label: Basic Filter
simpleFilter.hint: Filter only items that have this type.

how.add: Add a new slot by clicking the `+ Add` button.
how.remove: Remove a slot by right clicking on it.
how.image: Select an image for the slot by left clicking on it.
